text: 12.39: Mt 16.4 naŋga, Mk 8.12 naŋga, Lu 11.29-32Kamavahu Jisas nurɨŋ kɨmbɨ ambami, Nɨmati hɨrɨvɨyɨndu krunavundi ñamba ŋɨnɨŋ. Harɨm Gotɨŋ ndaya mavɨñɨ mandamandu. Imutamut muhɨmɨmuhɨm nzihɨ ŋgɨmɨndaŋ vata añaŋgarandu hara maŋgɨmandɨyu, manɨŋga. Muhɨm nzihɨ sihɨrahi ŋgɨmaña ha, kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara Jona sihɨrami handaya ŋgɨmandɨyu.
